summary: Texas is the second largest state in the United States.
full_text:
Miami  is a city in Roberts County, Texas, United States. It is part of the Pampa, Texas Micropolitan Statistical Area. The population was 597 at the 2010 census. It is the county seat of Roberts County and the only municipality in the county.
